name: Dungeon Rebound
description:
Dungeon Rebound is a unique and innovative take on the classic arcade genre. Players will take control of a character in a fast-paced, action-packed adventure that blends role-playing elements with classic arcade-style gameplay.




  • Control a diverse cast of RPG characters, each with their own unique abilities and playstyle.



  • Harness the power of magic, melee combat, ranged attacks, and more to dominate the court.



  • Level up your characters, unlock new skills, and customize your playstyle to match your strategic preferences.
